ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] vale
ygData.messageBody:
Farewell Tork.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Tork [mailto:tork_dropbox@...]
> Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 9:06 AM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: [eqbards] vale
>
>
> I know I wasn't the most prolific poster to the list, but I
> wanted to thank
> everyone for the list; its been a great source of information
> sure, but the
> community aspect has been invaluable both in and out of EQ.
> I know of no
> other EQ group which has bonded like eqbards, and to a lesser
> degree the
> concert hall; I am truly proud to have been among the ranks.
>
> In parting, I bid you all take care, have fun.
>
> Sincerely,
> -Tork@Nameless
> though much sacrifice, forever 50th Wood Elf Bard
> Legacy of Steel
>
>
> __________________________________________________
